<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Sync Workspaces"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/sync"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sync workspaces from remote to local database.

Fetches all workspaces for the authenticated organization and creates
any missing workspaces in the local database.

Returns statistics about the sync operation including the total number of workspaces
found and the number created locally.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
